name: Psychosis (itch)
description:
Help Rose, a 10 year old girl, run away from her crazy parents in this 1st person puzzle adventure.

Explore the mansion in an immersive 3D environment.

Solve the puzzles to escape.

Keep track of important things.

Uncover the story behind their motives!

But be weary! 

You mustn't get caught by them or it's back to the drawing board for you!

Controls:

  • ‘W’ / ‘S’ - Forwards / Backwards movement;
  • ‘A’ / ‘D’ - Left / Right movement;
  • ‘Mouse’:
    • Look around; 
    • Draw when Map is open;
    • Interact with Menus;
  • ‘Space Bar’ - Jump;
  • ‘Left Ctrl’ - Crouch;
  • ‘Left Shift’ - Run;
  • ‘E’ - Interact with Objects;
  • ‘R’ - Drop picked up Objects;
  • ‘M’ - Open / Close Map;
  • Running and dropping objects will make your parents go to your location;
  • They will follow you if you are seen;
  • If you get caught 3 times, game over. 

I'm a video-game student, currently second year of university. This was the last project of the semester created in about a week. 

If you find any bugs, please do tell me, I'm thinking about developing Psychosis further. 

Thank you and have fun!
